Class Student

java.lang.Object
Student
public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a student at the university, contains their id, name, gender(optional), grade point average and their records for each module

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Student​(int id, java.lang.String name, char gender, University uni)
    Constructor for student with gender
    Student​(int id, java.lang.String name, University uni)
    Constructor for student without gender

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addRecord​(StudentRecord newRecord)
    Adds a new StudentRecord to the records array
    double getGpa()  
    int getId()  
    java.lang.String getName()  
    java.lang.String printTranscript()
    Returns transcript for student
    void setAboveAverage()
    Invokes the setAboveAverage method for each record, to find if the student is above average in that module.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student​(int id, java.lang.String name, char gender, University uni)
      Constructor for student with gender
      Parameters:
      id -
      name -
      gender - must be M, F, or X. No gender can also be given using the other constructor
      uni - is passed so that the constructor can check that the id doesn't exist in the university already

    • Student

      public Student​(int id, java.lang.String name, University uni)
      Constructor for student without gender
      Parameters:
      id -
      name -
      uni - is passed so that the constructor can check that the id doesn't exist in the university already

    • addRecord

      public void addRecord​(StudentRecord newRecord)
      Adds a new StudentRecord to the records array
      Parameters:
      newRecord - StudentRecord to be added

    • printTranscript

      public java.lang.String printTranscript()
      Returns transcript for student
      Returns:
      script formatted script containing student details and their records

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()

    • setAboveAverage

      public void setAboveAverage()
      Invokes the setAboveAverage method for each record, to find if the student is above average in that module.
